overview: When a Midwest town learns that a corrupt railroad baron has captured the deeds to their homesteads without their knowledge, a group of young ranchers join forces to take back what is rightfully theirs. They will become the object of the biggest manhunt in the history of the Old West and, as their fame grows, so will the legend of their leader, a young outlaw by the name of Jesse James.
tagline: Sometimes the wrong side of the law is the right place to be.
title: American Outlaws

cast.name: Harris Yulin
cast.character: Thaddeus Rains - President Rock Northern Rail Road

actors_characters.character: Thaddeus Rains - President Rock Northern Rail Road
